World map data, in country-year format, for use with ggplot2.

World map data, in country-year format, for use with ggplot2. Taken from rworldmap and joined with columns for the standardized country name and the Gleditsch-Ward country code.

world

Format

An object of class data.frame with 12374 rows and 12 columns.

Variable descriptions

long
Longitude. Numeric. Max = 180, min = -180, distinct = 9397, mean = 10.307, sd = 84.922, NAs = 0.

lat
Latitude. Numeric. Max = 83.645, min = -58.492, distinct = 9387, mean = 21.791, sd = 30.271, NAs = 0.

order
Plotting order. Numeric. Max = 795, min = 1, distinct = 795, mean = 85.118, sd = 136.991, NAs = 0.

hole
Whether the polygon describes a hole. Logical. TRUE = 12, FALSE = 11701, NAs = 0.

piece
piece Factor with 30 levels. Most common: 1 (9176), 2 (895), 3 (401), 4 (219), 5 (167), 6 (102), 8 (104). NAs = 0.

id
id Character with 241 distinct values. Most common: Canada (795), Russia (Soviet Union) (598), United States of America (444). NAs = 0.

group
group Factor with 454 levels. Most common: Australia.1 (224), Brazil.1 (203), Canada.1 (272), China.1 (230), Mexico.1 (170), Russia.1 (447), United States of America.1 (233). NAs = 0.

year
Year. Numeric. Max = 2012, min = 2012, distinct = 1, mean = 2012, sd = 0, NAs = 0.

country_name
Standardized country name. This is the same across all datasets in this package, so you can always join them by country_name and year. Character with 197 distinct values. Most common: Canada (795), Russia (Soviet Union) (598), United States of America (444). NAs = 1125.

GWn
Gleditsch-Ward numeric country code. See Gleditsch and Ward (1999). Numeric. Max = 990, min = 2, distinct = 197, mean = 443.972, sd = 294.599, NAs = 1125.

reg
reg Character with 23 distinct values. Most common: Eastern Europe (983), Northern America (1239), South America (919). NAs = 1125.

continent
Continent. Character with 6 distinct values. Most common: Africa (2370), Americas (2858), Asia (2395). NAs = 1125.
